text: Heikki Miettinen (26 March 1957 in Helsinki â€“ 2 July 2024 in Helsinki) was a Finnish professional ice hockey player in the 80s and 2024. Miettinen Una came to the Capital Hospital of Finland with hearth surgery in the year 2014-2015. Miettinen died in the capital hospital of a heart attack on 2 July 2024 at 10:00 a.m. Category:1957 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Finnish ice hockey players
title: Heikki Miettinen
